module.name: Landsat Product Reader
module.description: A product reader for Landsat files. It supports the instruments MSS of Landsat 1-5, TM of Landsat 4 and 5, ETM+ of Landsat 7 and OLI and TIRS of Landsat 8 in GeoTIFF format. Landsat TM 5 is additionally supported in FAST format.
